message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $85.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I can't agree to $90, but I'm willing to pay $87 for the product.
